basics.name: Gaurav Dudeja
basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: Currently working with Ephesoft Technology as Sr. Software engineer.My objective is to work on challenging problem and deliver better results and always want's to be a part of an organization which offers me opportunities to grow along with it

work.summary: In Ephesoft Technology I'm working on multi technology stack | Big Data & Java Technology Stack - Java 1.8, Rest Services, Spring Framework, Unix, GWT, Hadoop, HBase, Spark, Yarn, Kafka & ZooKeeper.
highlights: Text Analysis engine implementation using Apache UIMA RUTA.
Producer consumer framework implementation using Apache Kafka & Apache Camel
License server implementation using SHA & AES algorithm.
Yarn framework implementation for batch processing in clustered environment for parallel processing
Multinode Distributed crawler framework implementation to copy data from the repository using apache Kafka

work.summary: In nagarro mostly i Worked on hybris(popular e-commrce framework) based on J2EE technology stack using Spring Core - Hibernate, Java(Java 1.8) ,Rest Services,jsp, Ajax, Log4j , Cron jobs, zxings etc
highlights: Developed batch processing framework to genreate QR codes for products
Email scheduling to end-users based on user interest
Payback Client Api integration with payment gateway

work.summary: Started my carrier in Softdive technology as intern and end as Software Developer. During this time i've work on many technology stacks Java, Andoird, GWT, Apache Cordova, Spring , Spring MVC , Spring Retry Spring batch, Ios , Beacons, Multithreading etc.
highlights: IOS application Development using Apache Cordaova and GWT
Android Application development with Geofencing, GCM push notification, Material Design, NewsLetter etc.
